LanguageData.RTN_Translation_GoddessApparelDescriptio: Should this item be equipped by a Goddess when they transform this will allow the item to use it's true power and grant additional abilities.
LanguageData.RTN_Translation_GoddessEquipmentDescript: Should this weapon be equipped by a Goddess, it will see a large increase in power and grant the use of additional abilities for the Goddess when they transform.
